skins.selfIntroduction: It's a bit hot... Ah, sorry. I am Tirpitz. Because I was stuck in the north by myself for so long, people suddenly started calling me the "Lone Queen of the North." If you think it's a good nickname, then you do not fully understand... how soulless those words are.
skins.acquisition: I was imprisoned in the north for so long, unable to return home, and now you want me to follow you? ...Very well. It is up to you to show me the world.
skins.login: Once you get used to waiting, you lose sight of what you were waiting for.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Big sister... Now that you mention it, I think I might actually have one... Ah... I've already started to forget.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Can you comprehend how it feels to watch the battlefield from afar, unable to do anything but lament the cruelty of war?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Strategic reasons? I was installed with cannons... but they were never meant to be fired. Ironic, isn't it?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I'll think of how to deal with you later.

skins.shipDescription: Summer... In the past, it was always just a hot and stifling season... But now...? Doesn't my outfit tell the whole story? Let's get going, there's bound to be a lot of people on the beach.
skins.acquisition: In the past, I never saw summer as more than a hot and humid slog... But now? My outfit probably says it all... Let's go, everyone's already waiting for us at the beach.
skins.login: Commander, there's no need to rush yourself. There is meaning in simply waiting for you.
skins.details: Commander, enjoy yourself to the fullest. Our hard-fought battles are for the sake of peaceful moments like these... and our hard-earned breaks provide us with will to keep fighting.
skins.secretaryIdle1: As long as you're by my side, even looking off into the horizon is meaningful.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Some of my colleagues seem to mistake me for some unapproachable ice queen... Perhaps playing beach volleyball with them would help...
skins.secretaryIdle3: The sunset and the beach at night are wonderful views. When you're done with work, want to accompany me for a walk along the shore?
skins.secretaryTouch: It's a bit stuffy... Commander, would you mind turning up the air conditioner?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Even though it's summer... there are still some things you shouldn't do...

skins.shipDescription: I bet Bismarck must've been thinking about how to invite me to the party, but ended up asking you to do it, Commander. Hehe... Let's get going soon. It's best not to keep her waiting.
skins.acquisition: I bet Bismarck must've been thinking about how to invite me to the party, but ended up asking you to do it, Commander. Hehe... Let's get going soon. It's best not to keep her waiting.
skins.login: So you've come, Commander. Don't be anxious, the night is still young.
skins.details: Truthfully, I still have a hard time conversing with Bismarck... But at least now, time is on our side. There will be plenty of things for us to talk about in the future, wouldn't you agree?
skins.secretaryIdle1: In the past, the word "sister" meant nothing to me. But the moment I laid eyes on her, I knew in my heart... Yes, she is indeed my sister.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Behold, she basks in everyone's adoring gaze as they orbit around her upon the resplendent firmament of the stage, as if she is the center of the universe... But you and I both know, that is not where she wants to be.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Waiting for her to find us instead of taking the initiative to find her might be a bit of my nasty streak showing, but I'm still the little sister here. I have that right, don't I?
skins.secretaryTouch: Hm? Ah, don't worry. I was merely pondering if I should call her "Bismarck" or "Sister."
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Huh? Was my discomfort that evident?

skins.ENClientName: Seasonal Pine and the Frost Flower
skins.shipDescription: They have a peculiar way of wishing a happy New Year in the Sakura Empire. In line with their traditions, I've put on this new outfit. I hope it doesn't... look strange on me. ...You like it? I see... That being the case, I'll keep wearing it for the time
skins.acquisition: They have a peculiar way of wishing a happy New Year in the Sakura Empire. In line with their traditions, I've put on this new outfit. I hope it doesn't... look strange on me. ...You like it? I see... That being the case, I'll keep wearing it for the time
skins.login: I waited for you, Commander. Now let us go and wish everyone a happy New Year, before aircraft come chasing after us.
skins.details: My Sakura Empire friends told me that the pine tree is like an anchor point for the gods. Much like what you are to me, Commander... Oh, just talking to myself. Hahah.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I must give my regards to my sister... But how I should face her, I do not know. Could you come with me, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Alabama proposed playing a type of badminton enjoyed around New Year's. I suppose that could be fun. ...The loser will have ink rubbed on t
skins.secretaryTouch: It feels warm... A nice change of pace.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: *sigh*... Could you please mind your manners in public?
